description: Edge case fixtures for Claude Code session model validation

malformed_write_param2.jsonl.description: JSON serialization bug where content containing XML-like tool invocation examples was mis-parsed, causing 'param2' to leak as an actual tool parameter
malformed_write_param2.jsonl.bug_outcome: Tool call rejected by Claude Code input validation
malformed_write_param2.jsonl.notes: The Write tool content contained markdown documenting tool invocation XML patterns. The string '<parameter name="param1">value1","param2":"value2"' was incorrectly parsed, extracting 'param2' as an actual JSON field.
